text: waldhyn amanuu biallah warusulih walam yfrriqu bayn 'ahad mnhm, 'uwlayik hum alsidiyqun aladhin kmul tsdyqhm bima ja'at bih alrsl, aetqadana wqwla wemla, walshuhada' eind rabihim lahum thwabhm aljazil eind allh, wanuruhum aleazim yawm alqyamt, waladhin kafaruu wkdhdhabu badltna whjjna 'uwlayik 'ashab aljhym, fala 'ajr lhm, wala nwr
